title: Stage Lv4-A6-S24
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: We have successfully completed the project. (business variant 1)
We have achieved all our goals. (business variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: We have successfully completed the project. (business variant 1)
We have achieved all our goals. (business variant 1)
We celebrate the team's hard work. (business variant 1)
We have reached an important milestone. (business variant 1)
We have learned a lot from this experience. (business variant 1)
We want to share the achievements with all team members. (business variant 1)
We have obtained excellent results. (business variant 1)
Knowledge and experience have been accumulated. (business variant 1)
We will utilize this achievement in the next project. (business variant 1)
We appreciate all team members' contributions. (business variant 1)
